p: Aluminium chloride was used to quantify the total flavonoid content by a 96-well plate analysis, as per the method previously published [ 12, 45, 46]. Quercetin was used as a reference standard (40–0.078 µg/mL). An amount of 100 µL test sample was stored at room temperature for 15 min with 100 µL of a 2% aqueous solution of aluminum chloride and the absorbance was recorded at 415 nm. All the experiments were done in triplicate.
